sentences.en: a way to avoid accidental erasure of data from your computer
sentences.cn: 避免无意中删除计算机资料的方法

sentences.en: An RS code is twice powerful at erasure correction than at error correction.
sentences.cn: 里德所罗门码对[抹除]的更正能力是一般错误的两倍.

sentences.en: Device erasure occurs by utting the proper erase command sequence.
sentences.cn: 设备檫除由执行发生合适擦掉命令顺序.

sentences.en: Erasure code is an important method for providing high availability in data storage.
sentences.cn: 纠删码是提供数据高可用性的重要方法.

sentences.en: Hardware implementation for the all - erasure RS decoder is proposed, including the finite field arithmetic operation units.
sentences.cn: 本文并提出纯粹抹除 式 里德所罗门解码器的硬体实现, 包括有限体中的算数运算模组.

sentences.en: In the future quantum computer, erasure is necessary for the renewed resources.
sentences.cn: 因此,将来的量子计算机中, 同样需要擦除信息,使资源能够重新利用.

sentences.en: In this paper , we discuss the relation between information erasure and heat dissipation in quantum memory.
sentences.cn: 讨论量子寄存器中信息擦除与散热的关系,发现量子态擦除的不可逆性将会导致量子寄存器的热耗散.
汇报一孬, 成绩抹掉.

sentences.en: The inspection, modification, replacement or erasure of part of file's contents.
sentences.cn: 检查 、 修改 、 代替或擦去文档内容一部分的过程.

sentences.en: The longitudinal component of the electric field increase the write speed and provdies erasure.
sentences.cn: 纵向电场提高了写入速度及擦除速度.

sentences.en: The past was erased, the erasure was forgotten, the lie became truth.
sentences.cn: 过去给人擦拭个干净, 擦拭的行为又忘了个干净,于是, 谎言就变成了真理.

sentences.en: The self - erasure happens because the new isomer of azobenzene is as stable as the old one.
sentences.cn: 自动清洁现象的发生是由于偶氮苯得异构体远不如其本体稳定.

sentences.en: To study the selective erasure and rewriting of the multiplexed holographic storage in photorefractive crystals.
sentences.cn: 研究光折变晶体中多重体全息存储的选择性擦涂和重写技术.

sentences.en: We summarize this with the motto binary compatibility ensures migration compatibility — or, more concisely, erasure eases evolution.
sentences.cn: 我们用名词“二进制兼容保证了迁移兼容性-或者更确切的说是, 擦除简化了演化”来概括这个特性.

sentences.en: Your writing would be subject to 1984 - style retroactive erasure.
sentences.cn: 你所写的将会遭到1984年的风格反动的删去.

words.tran_cn: 可消除的；可抹去的；可删除的

trans.tran_cn: 擦掉，删去，删掉的词，消音，抹音
trans.tran_en: when you erase something, or when something is erased
